thread.title: Soulwax Announce New Album FROM DEWEE | Pitchfork
thread.title_full: Soulwax Announce New Album FROM DEWEE | Pitchfork

title: Soulwax Announce New Album FROM DEWEE | Pitchfork
text:
Soulwax Announce New Album FROM DEWEE Recorded “2 days ago in 1 take” Soulwax Photo by snapshot-photography/ullstein bild via Getty Images 
In November, Soulwax have shared a new song called “ TRANSIENT PROGRAM FOR DRUMS AND MACHINERY .” The song will appear on an album called FROM DEWEE , which is out March 24 via Play It Again Sam. After planning and rehearing, the band recorded the album in its entirety in one take on February 7 at Dewaele studios in Belgium. Last year, Soulwax released the original soundtrack for Belgica , on which they recorded as 15 fictional bands. See their upcoming dates here . Artists In This Story
